<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plugin id="com.snc.pa.request" name="Performance Analytics - Content Pack - Request Management (Requested Item)" type="feature_set" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="CSHelp:Performance-Analytics-Content-Pack-Request-Management" state="published" version="1.0.0" trackable="true">
<description>Performance Analytics content pack for Request Management out-of-the-box KPIs for Requested Items. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate Performance Analytics license. Contact ServiceNow for details.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.pa" /> </requires>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Performance Analytics content pack for Request Management out-of-the-box KPIs for Requested Items. Activation of this plugin on production instances may require a separate Performance Analytics license.
